Description_lang: Coats your weapons with a Non-Lethal Poison that lasts for $d. Each strike has a $3408h% chance to poison the enemy, slowing movement speed by $3409s1% for $3409d.
AuraDescription_lang: Each strike has a chance of poisoning the enemy, slowing movement speed by $3409s1% for $3409d.

description_blz.en_US: Coats your weapons with a Non-Lethal Poison that lasts for 1 hour. Each strike has a 30% chance to poison the enemy, slowing movement speed by 50% for 12 sec.
description_blz.es_MX: Cubre tus armas con un veneno no letal que dura 1 h. Cada golpe tiene un 30% de probabilidad de envenenar al enemigo, lo que reduce su velocidad de movimiento un 50% durante 12 s.
description_blz.pt_BR: Cobre a arma com um Veneno Não Letal que dura 1 hora. Cada acerto tem 30% de chance de envenenar o inimigo, reduzindo em 50% a velocidade de movimento dele por 12 s.
description_blz.de_DE: Überzieht Eure Waffen mit einem nichttödlichen Gift, das 1 Stunde lang an ihnen haften bleibt. Bei jedem Angriff besteht eine Chance von 30%, den Gegner zu vergiften, was seine Bewegungsgeschwindigkeit für 12 Sek. um 50% verringert.
description_blz.en_GB: Coats your weapons with a Non-Lethal Poison that lasts for 1 hour. Each strike has a 30% chance to poison the enemy, slowing movement speed by 50% for 12 sec.
description_blz.es_ES: Cubre tus armas con un veneno no letal que dura 1 h. Cada golpe tiene un 30% de probabilidad de envenenar al enemigo, lo que reduce la velocidad de movimiento un 50% durante 12 s.
description_blz.fr_FR: Vous enduisez vos armes d’un poison non létal qui dure 1 heure. Chaque coup a 30% de chances d’empoisonner l’ennemi et de réduire sa vitesse de déplacement de 50% pendant 12 s.
description_blz.it_IT: Impregna le tue armi con un veleno non letale che dura 1 ora. Ogni colpo ha una probabilità del 30% di avvelenare il nemico, riducendone la velocità di movimento del 50% per 12 s.
description_blz.ru_RU: Наносит на ваше оружие несмертельный яд, который действует в течение 1 ч. Каждый удар с вероятностью 30% отравляет противника, снижая скорость его передвижения на 50% на 12 сек.
description_blz.ko_KR: 무기에 1시간 동안 유지되는 비치명독을 바릅니다. 매 공격 시 30%의 확률로 적을 중독시켜 12초 동안 이동 속도를 50%만큼 감소시킵니다.
description_blz.zh_TW: 在你的武器塗上非猛烈毒藥，持續1小時。每次打擊有30%機率讓敵人中毒，使其移動速度降低50%，持續12秒。
description_blz.zh_CN: 使用非致命药膏给一件武器浸毒，效果持续1小时。每次攻击都有30%的几率使敌人中毒，使其移动速度降低50%，持续12秒。
